resources.string: Use the buttons at the bottom to create a Frozen Yogurt. You have the choice between main ingredient, toppings and sauces.
Just read the list when ordering the Frozen Yogurt or use the button to generate a code that the seller can scan.
You want to show others your creation? Photograph the yogurt and publish it along with your recipe!
Your creation is ready to share!
This is a student project by Sebastian Faust, Julian Schoemaker and Dario Giuseppe Lazzara. It is a project of the "Mobile Computing" lecture at TH Köln in Germany..

The FroYou App is for everyone who wants to create his own Frozen Yogurt in an easy way. The customer have to choose between 3 different sizes of Yogurt before he starts to create his own Frozen Yogurt with all the ingredients. After the customer finished creating his own Yogurt, he got the possibility to transform his recipe into a QR Code for an easier way of ordering. Next to the QR Code, the customer can save his own creation into the intern recipegallery. Saving own recipes is completly unknown and just needs a photo of the yogurt, a name for the creation and a little description of the yogurt itself. If the customer doesn’t want to spend time in creating an own yogurt, he can choose one of the saved Yogurts created by other customers in the recipegallery, where he can see the photo, the name and the description of the yogurt, but also the different ingredients the creator used for it. The app got developed together with the Süße Ecke shop in Gummersbach, so all ingredients, prices and sizes are defined for the Süße Ecke. If the customer got internet connection he also get notifications if there are new recipes and if he creates a new yogurt he got updated ingredients.
